Title: Title and extent
description: Title and territorial extent of IPC.

Title: Punishment under IPC
Punishment: As prescribed in IPC for respective crimes.

Title: Punishment of offenses outside India
description: Punishment for crimes committed outside India.
Punishment: Same as if committed within India.

Title: Extension to extra-territorial offenses
description: Applies to offenses by Indian citizens abroad.
Punishment: Same as if committed in India.

Title: Exclusion of special laws
description: IPC does not override special or local laws.

Title: Definition of offense
description: Acts defined as offenses under IPC.

Title: Sense of expression once explained
description: Interpretation of terms used in IPC.

Title: Number definition
description: Singular includes plural and vice versa.

Title: Queen definition
description: Omitted after India became a republic.

Title: Definition of Government
description: Definition of Central and State Government.

Title: Definition of Public Servant
description: Who is considered a public servant.

Title: Dishonestly
description: Doing an act with dishonest intent.

Title: Fraudulently
description: Doing an act with fraudulent intent.

Title: Reason to believe
description: Having sufficient reason to believe something.

Title: Acts done by several persons in furtherance of common intention
Effect caused partly by act and partly by omission
description: Combined effect of act and omission.

Title: Sentence may be in certain cases
Limit to imprisonment for fine
Punishment: Up to one-fourth of maximum sentence.

Title: Description of imprisonment for non-payment of fine
Imprisonment for non-payment when offense punishable with fine only
Termination of imprisonment on payment of fine
Termination of imprisonment on part payment
description: Reduction in imprisonment on part payment.

Title: Fine to be recoverable within six years
Limit to punishment for offenses made up of several offenses
Punishment of offense committed with different intention
Solitary confinement
Punishment: Up to one month at a time.

Title: Act done by person bound by law
description: No offense if done under legal duty.

Title: Act done by judge
description: Protection for judges acting in official capacity.

Title: Act done under judgment or order
description: Protection for acts under court orders.

Title: Act done by mistake of fact
description: No offense if act done by mistake of fact.

Title: Act likely to cause harm
description: but done without criminal intent; No offense if act was necessary.

Title: Act of child under seven years of age
Act of child above seven and under twelve
Act of a person of unsound mind
Offense requiring intent committed by intoxicated person
description: Intoxication not a defense for intent-based crimes.

Title: Act not intended to cause death; done with consent
description: No offense if done with consent and no serious harm.

Title: Act done in good faith for benefit
description: No offense if act is in good faith.

Title: Act done for benefit of child or insane person
description: Protection for acts done for their benefit.

Title: Consent given under fear or misunderstanding
description: Invalid consent due to coercion or misbelief.

Title: Exclusion of acts that are offenses independently
description: Certain acts remain offenses despite consent.

Title: Act done in good faith without consent
Act done under compulsion
description: No offense if done under threat of death.

Title: Right of private defense against insane person
Acts against right of private defense
When the right of private defense extends to causing death
When the right of private defense extends to causing harm
description: Self-defense causing harm but not death.

Title: Commencement and continuation of the right of private defense
Right of private defense of property
When the right of private defense extends to causing harm to property
Commencement and continuation of the right of private defense of property
description: When defense of property starts and ends.

Title: Right of private defense against deadly assault
Punishment of abetment when act done with different intent
Liability of abettor when different act is committed
description: Abettor liable if a different crime occurs.

Title: Abettor when liability is enhanced
description: Stronger punishment if abetted crime is serious.

Title: Liability of abettor when effect is different from intended
description: If the crime results in unintended harm.
Punishment: Punishable as per actual harm caused.

Title: Abettor present when offense is committed
description: Abettor's liability when present at crime scene.

Title: Abetment of an offense punishable with death or life imprisonment
description: Serious abetment leading to grave crime.
Punishment: Up to 7 years imprisonment or fine.

Title: Abetment of offense punishable with imprisonment
Punishment: Punishable with half the imprisonment term.

Title: Abetting commission of offense by the public
Punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment or fine or both.

Title: Concealing design to commit offense punishable with death or life imprisonment
Punishment: Up to 10 years imprisonment and fine.

Title: Public servant concealing design to commit offense
description: Public servant failing to act on crime.
Punishment: Up to 10 years imprisonment and fine.

Title: Concealing design to commit offense punishable with imprisonment
Punishment: Up to one-fourth of the longest imprisonment term.

Title: Definition of criminal conspiracy
description: Agreement between persons to commit a crime.

Title: Punishment for criminal conspiracy
Punishment: Same as the main offense or up to 6 months imprisonment.

Title: Waging war against the Government of India
Punishment: Death or life imprisonment and fine.

Title: Collecting arms with intent to wage war
Punishment: Life imprisonment or up to 10 years and fine.

Title: Concealing intention to wage war
Punishment: Up to 10 years imprisonment and fine.

Title: Assaulting President; Governor; etc.
Punishment: etc.Up to 7 years imprisonment and fine.

Title: Waging war against a friendly power
Committing depredation on a territory of a friendly power
Punishment: Up to 7 years imprisonment and fine.

Title: Receiving property from enemy
Punishment: Up to 7 years imprisonment and fine.

Title: Public servant aiding prisoner escape
description: Allowing an enemy prisoner to escape.
Punishment: Life imprisonment or up to 10 years and fine.

Title: Public servant negligently allowing escape
Punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment and fine.

Title: Aiding escape of prisoner of war
Punishment: Life imprisonment or up to 10 years and fine.

Title: Abetting mutiny if mutiny is committed
Abetment of assault by a soldier on superior officer
description: Encouraging attack on senior military officers.
Punishment: Up to 10 years imprisonment and fine.

Title: Abetment of desertion from armed forces
Punishment: Up to 7 years imprisonment and fine.

Title: Abetment of an act prejudicial to military discipline
Punishment: Up to 6 months imprisonment or fine.

Title: Harboring a deserter
Punishment: Up to 2 years imprisonment and fine.

Title: Deserter found in possession of arms
Punishment: Up to 2 years imprisonment or fine.

Title: Abetment of an act prejudicial to military discipline
Punishment: Up to 6 months imprisonment or fine.

Title: Wearing unauthorized military uniforms
Punishment: Up to 3 months imprisonment or fine.

Title: Unlawful assembly
description: Group assembled to commit an illegal act.
Punishment: Up to 6 months imprisonment or fine.

Title: Being a member of an unlawful assembly
Punishment: Up to 6 months imprisonment or fine.

Title: Punishment for unlawful assembly
description: Punishment for being part of unlawful assembly.
Punishment: Up to 6 months imprisonment or fine.

Title: Joining an unlawful assembly with deadly weapons
Punishment: Up to 2 years imprisonment or fine.

Title: Continuing in an unlawful assembly after order to disperse
Punishment: Up to 2 years imprisonment or fine.

Title: Rioting
Punishment: Up to 2 years imprisonment or fine.

Title: Punishment for rioting
Punishment: Up to 2 years imprisonment or fine.

Title: Rioting with a deadly weapon
description: Using deadly weapons in a riot.
Punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment or fine.

Title: Every member of unlawful assembly guilty of offense committed
description: All members liable for group crimes.

Title: Hiring persons to join unlawful assembly
Knowingly joining unlawful assembly
description: Joining or continuing in unlawful assembly knowing it has been commanded to disperse.

Title: Assaulting public servant
description: Assaulting or obstructing public servant suppressing riot or unlawful assembly.

Title: Provocation with intent to cause riot
description: Wantonly giving provocation with intent to cause riotâ€”if rioting be committed; if not committed.

Title: Owner of land on which unlawful assembly is held
description: Owner or occupier of land on which an unlawful assembly is held.

Title: Public servant disobeying law
Punishment: with intent to cause injury to any person or Up to 2 years imprisonment

Title: Public servant framing incorrect document
description: Public servant framing an incorrect document with intent to cause injury.

Title: Public servant unlawfully engaging in trade
description: Public servant unlawfully engaging in trade.

Title: Public servant unlawfully buying property
description: Public servant unlawfully buying or bidding for property.

Title: Personating a public servant
description: Pretending to hold a public servant's office and acting as such.

Title: Wearing garb or carrying token used by public servant
description: Wearing any garb or carrying any token resembling that used by a public servant; with fraudulent intent.

Title: Absconding to avoid summons
description: Absconding to avoid receiving summons or other proceeding from a public servant.

Title: Preventing service of summons
description: Preventing the service of a summons or other legal process.

Title: Non-attendance in obedience to summons
description: Non-attendance in obedience to an order from a public servant.

Title: Omission to produce a document
description: Omission to produce a document to a public servant by a person legally bound to do so.

Title: Omission to give notice or information to public servant
description: Failure to give notice or information required by a public servant.

Title: Furnishing false information
description: Furnishing false information to a public servant.

Title: Refusing oath when duly required
description: Refusing to take an oath when legally required.

Title: Refusing to answer a public servant
description: Refusing to answer a public servant authorized to question.

Title: Refusing to sign a statement
description: Refusing to sign a statement made to a public servant.

Title: False statement on oath
description: Making a false statement on oath or affirmation.

Title: False information with intent to cause public servant to use his lawful power wrongly
description: Giving false information with intent to mislead a public servant.

Title: Giving false evidence
description: Knowingly giving false evidence in judicial proceedings.

Title: Fabricating false evidence
description: Fabricating false evidence for use in judicial proceedings.

Title: Punishment for false evidence
description: Punishment for giving or fabricating false evidence.

Title: Issuing or signing false certificates
description: Issuing or signing a false certificate.

Title: Causing disappearance of evidence
description: Causing the disappearance of evidence of an offence.
Punishment: Punishment varies depending on the severity of the offence concealed.

Title: False charge of offence
description: Falsely charging someone with committing an offence.

Title: Resistance to lawful apprehension
Punishment: Punishment varies depending on the nature of the obstruction.

Title: Import or export of counterfeit coin
description: Importing or exporting counterfeit Indian currency.

Title: Fraudulent alteration of weight of coins
description: Fraudulently altering the weight of a coin.

Title: Delivery of altered coin
description: Delivery of altered Indian coin as genuine.

Title: Possession of altered coin
description: Possession of altered Indian coin with knowledge.

Title: Erasure of mark on stamped document
description: Erasing or altering a mark denoting a stamped document.

Title: Adulteration of food or drink
description: Adulterating food or drink intended for sale.

Title: Sale of noxious food or drink
description: Selling food or drink unfit for consumption.

Title: Adulteration of drugs
description: Adulteration of drugs rendering them harmful.

Title: Sale of adulterated drugs
description: Selling adulterated drugs knowing them to be harmful.

Title: Injuring or defiling a place of worship
description: Destroying or damaging or defiling a place of worship.

Title: Uttering words to wound religious feelings
description: Uttering words with intent to wound religious feelings.

Title: Punishment for murder
Punishment: Death penalty or life imprisonment and fine.

Title: Culpable homicide not amounting to murder
description: Causing death without intention amounting to murder.

Title: Causing miscarriage
description: Causing a woman to miscarry with consent.

Title: Definition of grievous hurt
Punishment: Varies based on intent and consequence.

Title: Voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons
description: Causing hurt using dangerous weapons or means.

Title: Voluntarily causing grievous hurt by dangerous weapons
description: Causing grievous hurt using dangerous weapons.

Title: Voluntarily causing hurt to deter public servant
description: Hurting a public servant to deter duty.

Title: Assault on a woman to outrage her modesty
description: Assault or use of force on a woman intending to outrage her modesty.

Title: Extortion
description: Putting a person in fear to extort property.

Title: Definition of robbery
description: Committing theft or extortion with immediate violence.

Title: Belonging to a gang of dacoits
description: Being a member of a gang engaged in dacoity.

Title: Punishment for belonging to gang of thieves
description: Being a member of a gang engaged in theft.

Title: Assembling for purpose of committing dacoity
description: Assembling with the intent to commit dacoity.

Title: Dishonestly receiving stolen property
description: Receiving or retaining stolen property knowingly.

Title: Assisting in concealment of stolen property
description: Helping in concealing or disposing of stolen property.

Title: Cheating and dishonestly inducing delivery of property
description: Cheating and dishonestly inducing a person to deliver property.

Title: Definition of mischief
description: Causing wrongful loss or damage to property.

Title: Mischief by fire or explosive substance
description: Causing damage by fire or explosive substances.

Title: Punishment for criminal trespass
description: Entering property unlawfully with criminal intent.

Title: House-trespass after preparation for hurt or assault or wrongful restraint
description: House-trespass after preparation for hurt assault o wrongful restraint
Punishment: Up to 7 years imprisonment and fine.

Title: Forgery
description: Making false documents or altering them fraudulently.

Title: Forgery for cheating
description: Forgery committed with the purpose of cheating.

Title: Using as genuine a forged document
description: Using a forged document as if it were genuine.

Title: Fraudulent cancellation or destruction of accounts
Punishment for counterfeiting a property mark
description: Counterfeiting property marks with fraudulent intent.

Title: Possession of forged or counterfeit currency-notes
description: Possessing counterfeit currency notes with knowledge.

Title: Cohabitation caused by deceit
description: Causing a woman to believe she is legally married and cohabiting.

Title: Defamation
description: Making false statements that harm a person's reputation.

Title: Criminal intimidation or Threatening injury to a person
Word; gesture or act intended to insult modesty of a woman
description: Using any word; gesture; or act intended to insult the modesty of a woman.

Title: Attempting to commit offenses punishable with life or other imprisonments
description: Attempting an offense punishable with imprisonment.
Punishment: Half the punishment of the intended offense.

Title: Punishment for certain offenses committed beyond India
description: Punishment for offenses committed outside India but applicable under IPC.

Title: Impersonation for cheating
description: Personating another with intent to cheat.

Title: Offering false information to prevent summons
description: Giving false information to prevent legal proceedings.

Title: Aiding escape of prisoner
description: Helping a prisoner to escape from lawful custody.

Title: Harboring offenders
description: Knowingly harboring a person who has committed an offense.
Punishment: Punishment as applicable to the offender.

Title: Public servant disobeying law
description: Public servant disobeying the law with intent to cause harm.

Title: Fabricating false evidence
description: Creating false evidence to mislead judicial proceedings.

Title: Punishment for perjury
description: Giving false evidence in a judicial proceeding.

Title: Falsifying official records
description: Tampering with official records to cause harm.

Title: Public mischief
description: Spreading false information to create public disorder.

Title: Defiling public property
description: Destroying or defiling public property with intent to harm.

Title: Tampering with court documents
description: Altering or destroying court records unlawfully.

Title: Endangering public safety
description: Acts that endanger public safety or security.
